_description: The Senses and the Crucifixion — two couplets as sermon heads with Latin side notes: ‘Respiciamus: oculis, auribus, gustu, tactu’ in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
þe rede stremes renningþe Iewes orible criȝingOf
                    Cristis drink þe bitternesseOf Cristis wondis þe
                    sarpnesse

Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
